name: GetPlayerFacingAngle
notes: Angles returned when inside a vehicle is rarely correct. To get the correct facing angle while inside a vehicle, use GetVehicleZAngle.
warnings: Angles are reversed in GTA:SA; 90 degrees would be East in the real world, but in GTA:SA 90 degrees is in fact West. North and South are still 0/360 and 180. To convert this, simply do 360 - angle.
description: Gets the angle a player is facing.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player you want to get the angle of.

params_body.name: &Float:ang
params_body.description: The Float to store the angle in, passed by reference.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player does not exist.

 The player's angle is stored in the specified variable.
related_fn:
GetVehicleZAngle: Check the current angle of a vehicle.
 SetPlayerFacingAngle: Set a player's facing angle.
